item.title: Goals
item.description: I’m currently in a position where I have so many things I’d like to do. Some shortlist. Photography Portraiture - whenever I meet someone that I’m interested in. Nature - when I’m with mother nature. Street Photography - whenever I’m in a city where it’s appropriate. Short Film Documentary Software Development Surfing In no particular order and that’s probably a lot of things already. But well, I may not be an expert on any, but I enjoy it, so yeah, fuck it, I’m going to try learning these things.
